entries.journal_entry_description: Radeld Siwar, a mere acquaintance of Han Solo, has volunteered to teach you the way of the Smuggler. Find him and speak with him.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Hey, kid. You seem a little lost. Talk to Radeld Siwar. He'll show you the ropes. Maybe I'll see you around. You're a good kid.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Find and speak with Radeld Siwar, one of Han Solo's aquaintances. Look for him in the Mos Eisley Combat Hall.
